Class Conversation

java.lang.Object
Conversation
public class Conversation extends Object
Template class for all conversations created between a Seller and a Customer. Stores elementary details about a conversation. Also stores a destination file's path where all Message(s) are stored in memory.

  • Constructor Details

    • Conversation

      public Conversation(String conversationString)
      Parses a Conversation object's String and converts it into a Conversation object. Used while reading Conversation(s) from memory. Inherently calls User(String userString, boolean hasDetails)
      Parameters:
      conversationString - A Conversation String
      See Also:
      • toString()

    • Conversation

      public Conversation(String conversationID, String fileName, Seller seller, Customer customer)
      Creates a new Conversation object with provided parameters. Used when creating a new Conversation before appending or writing to a conversations.txt.
      Parameters:
      conversationID - The conversation's unique ID. Created from participants' usernames
      fileName - The destination file's path that will contain all Message object Strings of Messages in this Conversation. Created from participants' email IDs
      seller - The seller in the conversation
      customer - The customer in the conversation

  • Method Details

      public String getFileName()
      Accessor method for String FILE_NAME
      Returns:
      Returns the conversation's file

    • isSellerUnread

      public boolean isSellerUnread()
      Accessor method for boolean sellerUnread
      Returns:
      Returns the read status of the conversation for the participating Seller.

    • isCustomerUnread

      public boolean isCustomerUnread()
      Accessor method for boolean customerUnread
      Returns:
      Returns the read status of the conversation for the participating Customer.

    • setConversationID

      public void setConversationID(PrintWriter writer, String conversationID)
      Mutator method that changes the conversationID to the parameter conversationID. Sends request to update conversations.txt for later retrieval.
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      conversationID - The new conversationID

    • setSellerUnread

      public void setSellerUnread(boolean sellerUnread, PrintWriter writer)
      Mutator method that changes the sellerUnread status to the parameter sellerUnread. Sends request to update conversations.txt for later retrieval.
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      sellerUnread - The new read status of the conversation for the participating Seller

    • setCustomerUnread

      public void setCustomerUnread(PrintWriter writer, boolean customerUnread)
      Mutator method that changes the customerUnread status to the parameter customerUnread. Sends request to update conversations.txt for later retrieval.
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      customerUnread - The new read status of the conversation for the participating Customer

    • readFileAsPerUser

      public ArrayList<Message> readFileAsPerUser(User user)
      Reads this Conversation's destination file to compile an ArrayList<Message> of messages according to the parameter user's deletions (i.e. Message.senderVisibility or Message.recipientVisibility). Inherently calls the Message constructor Message(String messageString)
      Parameters:
      user - The user viewing this Conversation
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList<Message> of messages according to the parameter user's deletions

    • readFile

      public ArrayList<Message> readFile()
      Reads this Conversation's destination file to compile an ArrayList<Message> of messages. Inherently calls the Message constructor Message(String messageString)
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList<Message> of all messages in this Conversation's destination file

    • writeFile

      public boolean writeFile(ArrayList<Message> messages)
      Overwrites the all Message objects in parameter messages into the destination file ASIDE FROM those deleted by both Seller and Customer
      Parameters:
      messages - The ArrayList<Message> of messages to write into the file
      Returns:
      Returns whether the file was overwritten successfully

    • appendToFile

      public boolean appendToFile(String stringMessage, User sender, User recipient)
      Appends a new Message object String to the destination file. Inherently calls the Message constructor Message(String messageString)
      Parameters:
      stringMessage - The new message's content
      sender - The sender of the new message
      recipient - the recipient of the new message
      Returns:
      Returns whether the new message was appended to the file successfully

    • importTXT

      public boolean importTXT(PrintWriter writer, String filePath, User sender, User recipient)
      Reads the file at the parameter filePath to compile a String message and appends it to this Conversation's destination file. Indirectly calls appendToFile(String stringMessage, User sender, User recipient)
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      filePath - The path of the input .txt file to be read
      sender - The sender (active user) of the message
      recipient - The recipient of the message. Taken from the Conversation depending on the active user's role
      Returns:
      Returns whether the message was sent successfully

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Checks the equality of two Conversation objects. Compares all class fields ASIDE FROM boolean customerUnread and boolean sellerUnread.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - Object to be compared with
      Returns:
      Returns whether the equality condition was met

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Generates a formatted String of the Conversation containing all details.

      General format:
      Conversation<conversationID, FILE_NAME, SELLER.detailedToStringWithoutStores(), customer.detailedToString(), sellerUnread, customerUnread>
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      Returns the Message object's String
